Garcia, et al. “New Approaches to the Study of Village Sites in the Territory of Venosa in the Classical and Hellenistic Periods.” Agri Centuriati 11 (2015): 31–60. https://openaccess.leidenuniv.nl/handle/1887/48569.

description: Originally a settlement of the Peucetti, Venusia became a Latin colony in 291 BCE following the Third Samnite War.
